lines.text:
[to recently captured Stealmore]
Let there be no evil in this temple again. You will be free again, but first you must understand that the world is a place for peace and harmony, and not for selfishness and greed.

[among room filled with jewels]
Diamonds, rubies, sapphires, even cubic zirconium!

[sees aliens arriving in jungle]
I forgot to get a cage!
[goes and get one with a tortoise in it]
[throws the tortoise out and then is about to drive off, when she realizes something in angry tone]
AWW, FAWN! the TORTOISE WILL RUN AWAY!
[tortoise tries to run of when she catches it and speaks to it]
You know, there'll be a lot of rich animal collectors who will pay a lot of money for that shell of yours!
There there, David just has a very lively... imagination, that's all! That's healthy for any active kid his age! When I was a boy, it was a very different story! I ignored MY imaginary friend!
